Module.Content:
<script>

         console.time('TestGadget2Timer');         

         function pausecomp(millis) {
           var date = new Date();
           var curDate = null;
           console.timeStamp();
           do { curDate = new Date(); }
             while(curDate-date < millis);
         }

         var f = pausecomp(5000);

         console.timeEnd('TestGadget2Timer');
 
       </script>
